actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 101-599, by Mr. Derrick.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 5258. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. All points of order against consideration of the bill for failure to comply with the provisions of clause 2(l)(6) of rule XI are waived. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 131.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 251 - 173 (Roll no. 244).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5258) to require that the President transmit to Congress, that the congressional Budget Committees report, and that the Congress consider a balanced budget for each fiscal year.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5258 (balanced budget).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5258) to require that the President transmit to Congress, that the congressional Budget Committees report, and that the Congress consider a balanced budget for each fiscal year.
